about.title: About Me
about.content:
Hi, I'm Jenny, a certified Kangoo Jump trainer. I'm passionate about combining fitness with fun, and I've found Kangoo Jumps to be the perfect way to do that. These low-impact, high-energy workouts are great for improving cardio, strength, and flexibility while keeping things exciting!

I love helping people of all fitness levels feel confident and motivated. Whether you're new to fitness or an experienced athlete, my classes are designed to energize and challenge you in a fun way.

Join me for a Kangoo Jump session and experience a workout that's as enjoyable as it is effective!

welcomeText: Welcome to my Kangoo Jump classes, where fun, fitness, and results come together to help you feel stronger and more energized!
startPrompt: Click the button below to get started.
gallerySubtitle: Explore photos from my Kangoo Jump classes. Each picture captures the fun and energy we share together!

schedule.title: Weekly Schedule

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Kangoo Jump is a fun and high-intensity workout that uses special rebound shoes designed to reduce impact and increase calorie burn.
faq.q2: How can I book a Kangoo Jumps class?
faq.a2: You can book a class by visiting our schedule page or contacting us directly through the contact form.
faq.q3: What are the benefits of Kangoo Jumps?
faq.a3: Kangoo Jumps helps improve cardiovascular fitness, strengthens muscles, and enhances coordination while minimizing joint stress.
faq.q4: Do I need to bring my own shoes?
faq.a4: We provide Kangoo Jumps shoes for all participants, but feel free to bring your own if you prefer.

contacts.title: Contact
contacts.subtitle: Do you have questions or want to get in touch? Use the form below to send a message. I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
contacts.description2: You can also reach me through social media or by email.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.intro: If you wish to delete your personal data from our system, please follow the instructions below.
dataDeletion.step1: Send an email to our team requesting deletion of your data
dataDeletion.step2: In the email, please include information that will help us identify your account (username, email address, etc.)
dataDeletion.step3: Our team will process your request within 30 days and notify you upon completion
dataDeletion.alternative: If you prefer, you can use
dataDeletion.confirmation: Once we receive your request, we will send you a confirmation and keep you informed about the deletion process.
